tip.spectrum.translation_help: See an issue in your language? Contribute translations at the %s
tip.spectrum.polydex_search: Use %s to search for items and recipes, including from mods
tip.spectrum.anvil_repair: You can repair a %s by using an %s on it with %s
tip.spectrum.anvil_damage: You can damage an %s by using an %s on it with %s
tip.spectrum.pose_armor_stands: Pose an %s or a %s by holding %s and using %s on them
tip.spectrum.disable_spawners: Surround a %s with five %s to disable it
tip.spectrum.sponge_absorption_radius: A %s has a bigger absorption radius when next to another one
tip.spectrum.bottle_your_xp: Use a %s while holding %s to bottle your XP at 90%% efficiency
tip.spectrum.crying_obsidian_portal: %s is also a valid block for building a nether portal
tip.spectrum.cycle_paintings: Use %s on a %s while holding another one to cycle through the images
tip.spectrum.small_nether_portals: Nether portals can be smaller than usual, such as 1x2
tip.spectrum.dismount_mobs: Use %s while holding %s to dismount mobs from %s and %s
tip.spectrum.spectrum_client: This server has a custom client: %s with 21x higher render distance and 10x higher FPS
tip.spectrum.opening_double_doors: %s will open together with another one if they're placed next to each other
tip.spectrum.easy_elytra_takeoff: Use %s with a %s in hand while wearing an %s to take off. No %s spam needed!
tip.spectrum.enchantments_wiki: If you find an enchantment you don't recognise, look it up in the %s or %s
tip.spectrum.extract_poison: Use %s on a spider with a %s in your hand to extract its poison
tip.spectrum.arrows_light_fire: Lit %s will light a fire when they land
tip.spectrum.hang_glider_before_elytra: Craft a %s to fly before you get an %s
tip.spectrum.claim_creation: Protect your build by crafting a %s
tip.spectrum.claim_customisation: Customise how your land claim works by using %s
tip.spectrum.transfer_enchantments: Transfer an enchantment from an item to a %s with a %s
tip.spectrum.grindstone_sharpening: Hold %s and use %s on a %s while holding a tool to temporarily sharpen it
tip.spectrum.highspeed_rail: Place %s on %s to travel at high speeds
tip.spectrum.ice_prevents_crop_growth: Place %s under crops to prevent them from growing
tip.spectrum.minecart_linking: Use %s with a %s on a %s to start creating a train
tip.spectrum.mastercutter_docs: The %s is a lot more powerful than usual. Check %s for all the details
tip.spectrum.no_hostiles_around_campfire: Hostile mobs will not spawn around a %s and will catch on fire if they get near
tip.spectrum.persistent_parrots: Parrots prefer to stay on your shoulder. To get them off, press %s while holding %s
tip.spectrum.polyfactory: Automate crafting and processing by building a factory with %s
tip.spectrum.random_bonemeal_flowers: Using %s on a %s has the chance of spawning all flower types
tip.spectrum.right_click_harvest: Use %s on a grown crop to harvest and replant it with a single click
tip.spectrum.skippy_ender_pearls: A thrown %s will skip on the water surface before sinking
tip.spectrum.televator: Craft a %s and use %s/%s to teleport between floors of your base
tip.spectrum.thoroughfabric: As you walk on %s, it will eventually wear down and turn into %s, then %s
tip.spectrum.ping: Use %s to point out a location to nearby players
